info.task: read information about expanded disclosure button
info.title: Read information about an expanded disclosure button in reading mode

setupScript.name: moveFocusToAndExpandFirstDisclosure
setupScript.description: sets focus on the first disclosure button, and sets its state to expanded

user: With the reading cursor on the first disclosure button in the list of frequently asked questions, read information about the button.
instructions.raw: With the reading cursor on the first disclosure button in the list of frequently asked questions, read information about the button.
instructions.mode: Verify the Virtual Cursor is active by pressing Alt+Delete. If it is not, turn on the Virtual Cursor by pressing Insert+Z.

assertions.expectation: Name, 'What do I do if I have a permit for an assigned lot, but can't find a space there?', is conveyed
State of the button (expanded) is conveyed
